body.name: Rose Water for Face & Hair, USDA Certified Organic Facial Toner. Alcohol-Free Makeup Setting Hydrating Spray Mist. 100% Natural Anti-Aging Petal Rosewater by Simplified Skin (1 Pack 4oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: 100% NATURAL & ORGANIC: Naturally hydrate and moisturize your skin with our refreshing Rosewater. It's USDA organic certified with ZERO additives, artificial fragrances & alcohol. Use it as a facial mist for a radiant glow or hair for a bright shine

SKIN BENEFITS: Our Rose Water has anti-aging & anti-inflammatory properties to promote youthful skin & reduce skin irritation & redness. It maintains the skin's pH balance to clean pores and reduce Acne, Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Sun Damage & Dark Spots

HAIR CARE: Our floral rose water for hair replenishes lost moisture for smoother, shinier & healthier hair. With rose hydrosol, it relieves dry hair from heat damage from blow dryers & other appliances and decreases dandruff & promotes hair growth

MULTI-PURPOSE: Our toner for face will keep you feeling beautiful all day long. It works as a makeup setting spray & remover to start and finish your day feeling refreshed. With its beautiful rose scent, you'll never want to leave home without it!

SAFE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Our fresh facial toner is Cruelty-free, Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Gluten-free, & safe for all skin types. It's bottled in the USA in a glass bottle for a luxurious, spa-like experience in the comfort of your own home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rosewater Mist Toner Retinol Moisturizer Cream Glycolic Acid Toner Hyaluronic Serum Vitamin C Serum Product Benefits A versatile mist for both skin and hair, offering a refreshing glow, makeup setting, pH balance maintenance, and hydration for skin, along with aromatherapy, frizz reduction, and shine enhancement for hair. A natural solution to moisturize, soothe, and rejuvenate skin, addressing uneven tone, texture, fine lines, acne spots, dark circles, wrinkles, and sun damage while preventing breakouts and irritation. An exfoliating formula revealing brighter, smoother, younger-looking skin by gently removing dead cells, while also correcting pH balance and addressing signs of aging. Improve uneven Skin tone and texture by providing intense moisture and hydration. Helps to boost Collagen, Shrink pores and Prevent breakouts. A multi-purpose skincare solution targeting fine lines, aging signs, uneven tone, and texture, with collagen-boosting, pore-shrinking, and breakout-preventing effects. Made Organic 100% Natural & USDA Organic, Zero Additives & Alcohol, Vegan-Friendly, Cruelty-free, Paraben free, Sulphate free, Gluten-free, artificial Fragrance-free. Not tested on animals (Cruelty-free), Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Gluten-free Not tested on animals (Cruelty-free), Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Alcohol-free and Gluten-free, Not tested on animals (Cruelty-free), Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Gluten-free, and Fragrance-free, Not tested on animals (Cruelty-free), Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, Gluten-free, and Fragrance-free, Skin Types Ideal for all skin type Ideal for all skin type Ideal for all skin type Ideal for all skin type Ideal for all skin type Use For Face & Hair Face & Eye Area Face Face & Eye Area Face & Eye Area Ingredients Organic rose water Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract Glycolic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Jojoba Oil Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Plant Based Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E) Usage Spray on face and neck area after cleansing and before serum. Can be used several times throughout the day to refresh the skin. Apply all over face, neck and decolette. Can be used morning and night. Apply after washing, toning and then a serum. Can be used under makeup. Can be used daily, twice a week, or less depending on each person unique skin profile. Apply after cleansing and before serum and moisturizer are applied. Can be used twice a day. Can be used under make up. Apply small amount with fingertips to freshly cleansed and toned face, neck and décolleté areas. Allow time to absorb and follow with high quality moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rose Water for more than your face!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE rose water for my face after I cleanse. Then I use it as a setting spray after my make up. I love love that smell. It also is good for bug bites, mosquitos, or scratches and even soothes sunburn! I cannot be without my rose water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have even if you just love the taste of roses
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing like rose milk tea. Great for aromatherapy and to scent your hair. Have not used on skin so cant speak to that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a natural rose
reviews.reviewText: Such a refreshing scent. Wonderful spritz on your face to moisturizer naturally. Freshens hair also. It smell phenomenal… not perfumery at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this product after washing my face. Very smoothing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good to moisturize, soften face and hair. Wonderful scent especially for hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I rinse my face in the shower in the morning and pat it dry. Then I spray this all over and let it air dry. Then I add any serums, really just a Vitamin C, and finally a moisturizer. My skin is really happy, the redness is almost gone and the spots are getting lighter. I will buy this again. Plus it smells nice and light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this for my face
reviews.reviewText: I would buy this again, and have . I use this for my face as a toner, in my bathwater, on my dry hair, on my wet hair, in my body wash and I even use this for baking!!! I do love this product it smells like fresh roses no chemically smell. I have sensitive skin and there is no irritation. It feels soothing… my whole well-being. Just seems more relaxed when I spray this on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: product rejuvenate your face instantly. Amazing
